title: Morningstar
content:
Morningstar Common 1~8 Damage 1d8Piercing Main Hand OnlyTenacity: When you miss an attack, you deal Bludgeoning damage anyway. Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: A tuft of hair is caked to the base of one this morningstar's jagged spikes. Morningstar 1.8 50
